metadata.name: z Mod items EID Korean translations
metadata.description:
This mod adds Korean EID translations for following modded items: [list] [*]Fiend Folio (Also adds : Golem machines) [*]Retribution [*]Revelations [*]Samael [*]Deliverance [*]Heaven's Call (Solar Update) [*]Warp Zone [*]The Sheriff [*]Yondu's Descent [*]Alice of Blue Archive [*]Community Remix (2024) [*]Sacred Dreams [*]Tainted Treasure Rooms [*]Godmode Achieved [*]Kirby [*]Lazy Mattpack [*]Lost and Forgotten [*]Auri [*]ItemJam Vol.1 [/list] Released as seperate mod to make translation update faster.
Please enjoy original mod. EID : https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=836319872 Listed mods : https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3299692393
Special thanks to Curezor for adding Fiend Folio icons for EID!
